resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158379</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158379</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3114</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 14: Bartley and the Whale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - Nr. 14: Bartley und der Wal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - Non 14 : Bartley et la 
baleine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - No. 14: Bartley e a 
baleia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - No 14: Bartley e la 
balena</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - αριθ. 14: Bartley και η 
φάλαινα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - No 14: Bartley y la
ballena</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a reading assignment of a passage about whales, where the students are required to write some facts about whales, and to determine the order of events in the passage.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sentence order.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Lektüre eines Durchganges über 
Wale, in denen die Kursteilnehmer benoetigt werden, einige Tatsachen 
über Wale zu schreiben, und die Ordnung von Fällen im Durchgang 
festzustellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une attribution de lecture d'un passage au 
sujet des baleines, où les étudiants sont requis d'écrire quelques 
faits sur des baleines, et pour déterminer la commande des 
événements dans le passage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atribuição de leitura de uma 
passagem sobre as baleias, onde os estudantes são requeridos escrever
alguns fatos sobre baleias, e para determinar a ordem dos eventos na 
passagem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'assegnazione di lettura di un passaggio
circa le balene, in cui gli allievi sono tenuti a scrivere alcuni 
fatti circa le balene e determinare l'ordine degli eventi nel 
passaggio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια ανάθεση ανάγνωσης μιας μετάβασης για 
τις φάλαινες, όπου οι σπουδαστές πρέπει για να γράψουν μερικά 
γεγονότα για τις φάλαινες, και για να καθορίσει την κατάταξη των 
γεγονότων στη μετάβαση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es una asignación de lectura de un paso 
sobre las ballenas, donde requieren a los estudiantes escribir algunos
hechos sobre ballenas, y determinar la orden de acontecimientos en el 
paso.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programmsatzordnung.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">commande de phrase.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ordem da sentença.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ordine di frase.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατάταξη πρότασης.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">orden de la sentencia.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
